title: World News, Economics and Analysis Based on Bible Prophecy
cleaned_text:
As the Biden administration urges every American to get vaccinated, some alarming details are emerging about the covid-19 vaccine’s dangerous side effects. Data released by the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (cdc) on March 21 shows that 38,444 people experienced an “adverse event” after getting jabbed. These adverse events include birth defects (48 cases), miscarriages (90 cases), permanent disabilities (734 cases), hospitalizations (3,968 cases), and deaths (1,739 cases).

The influential anti-vaccine organization Children’s Health Defense contacted the cdc on March 8 with questions about how the agency was investigating reports of deaths and injuries after covid-19 vaccines. But none of their questions have been answered.

Instead, news outlets are reporting that there is “no evidence covid-19 vaccines cause death,” while epidemiologists dismiss contrary reports as mere coincidence. Yet the real-life stories of those who died suddenly after getting vaccinated provide reason to doubt these epidemiologists’ claims.

In Norway, 23 elderly died within days of receiving their first dose of the Pfizer vaccine. The Norwegian Medicines Agency assessed 13 of these deaths and admitted that “reports might indicate that common side effects from mRNA vaccines, such as fever and nausea, may have led to the deaths of frail patients.”

Kassidi Kurill, 39, died within days of her second dose of the Moderna covid-19 vaccine. Her father contends she was “healthy and good, then she took the shot.” Gregory Michaels, 56, died of a hemorrhagic stroke two weeks after he got jabbed with a covid-19 vaccine, and his widow affirms that he died “due to a strong reaction to the covid vaccine.” Former Detroit news anchor Karen Hudson-Samuels, 68, died one day after taking the vaccine, though public health officials say the cause of her death is unknown. And Daniel Thayne Simpson, 90, died within a day of getting jabbed with the vaccine, prompting public health officials to once again repeat that covid-19 vaccines are nothing to worry about.

But how can these public health officials be so sure that covid-19 vaccines are safe?

It normally takes five to 10 years of development before medical professionals declare a new vaccine safe for human use. Yet both the Pfizer and the Moderna versions of the covid-19 vaccine were developed in a single year. So, these vaccines have not undergone the rigorous testing that most vaccines undergo. This is especially concerning when you realize that Pfizer and Moderna have developed a brand-new type of mRNA vaccine. Wherein normal vaccines use killed or inactive versions of a pathogen to prompt the body to start manufacturing antibodies against that pathogen, mRNA vaccines use a specialized sequence of ribonucleic acid to hijack a cell’s protein-making machinery and make it produce the spike protein that gives the coronavirus its crown-like appearance.

So instead of injecting people with dead covid-19 cells, medical health professionals are injecting people with acids that cause human cells to manufacture covid-19 proteins. This is a potentially game-changing technology, but despite claims to the contrary, scientists still have no idea what the unintended consequences of injecting people with mRNA will be.

“This is not your normal flu vaccine,” noted Dr. Carrie Madej, an internal medicine specialist in Georgia. “This is something totally different. This is a witches’ brew. I’ve never seen anything like this in science or medicine.”

In addition to experimental mRNA molecules, both the Pfizer and the Moderna versions of the covid-19 vaccine contain polyethylene glycol—a petrochemical known to cause skin rashes, nausea, vomiting, difficulty breathing and shock. And the AstraZeneca version (which has not been approved by the U.S. Food & Drug Administration) was developed using kidney cells from a baby aborted in 1973 and a cold-causing virus isolated from the stool of chimpanzees.

So, Dr. Madej’s comparison to a “witches’ brew” is not completely out-of-place.

Millions of people are allowing themselves to be injected with a cocktail of chemicals and experimental molecules in hopes that this action will protect them from coronavirus. Yet in thousands of cases, this toxic brew ultimately kills them. Is this really our best line of defense against a covid-19 pandemic?

God inspired the Apostle John to write, “Beloved, I wish above all things that thou mayest prosper and be in health, even as thy soul prospereth” (3 John 2). So if we’re sick, God wants to heal us. And He wants to heals us in a way that does not involve the side effects that result from injecting yourself with polyethylene glycol, ribonucleic acid, chimpanzee feces, or stem cells from aborted fetuses.

To learn about God’s solution to covid-19 and other serious health problems, please watch the Key of David program “God’s Promise to Heal,” by Trumpet editor in chief Gerald Flurry.
